content.raw:
We are getting some backlog in Jenkins, especially when there are hanging jobs.

Can we enable the code_check script in homebrew, utopic, and coverage jobs? I believe they aren't currently running.

Also, the `gazebo-any-coverage` job requires `trusty-gpu-nvidia`, so it is redundant with the `gazebo-any-devel-trusty-gpu-nvidia` job. Perhaps we can trigger the non-GPU trusty job instead, so it can run on a different machine and give faster feedback about failures?
content.html:
We are getting some backlog in Jenkins, especially when there are hanging jobs.

Can we enable the code_check script in homebrew, utopic, and coverage jobs? I believe they aren't currently running.

Also, the gazebo-any-coverage job requires trusty-gpu-nvidia, so it is redundant with the gazebo-any-devel-trusty-gpu-nvidia job. Perhaps we can trigger the non-GPU trusty job instead, so it can run on a different machine and give faster feedback about failures?
